remarks: The Selberg function can be expressed using the convolution product of the von Mangoldt function with itself.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-May-2016.)
statement:
pntsval.1 $e |- S = ( a e. RR |-> sum_ i e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` a ) ) ( ( Lam ` i ) x. ( ( log ` i ) + ( psi ` ( a / i ) ) ) ) ) $.
pntsval2 $p |- ( A e. RR -> ( S ` A ) = sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) ( ( ( Lam ` n ) x. ( log ` n ) ) + sum_ m e. { y e. NN | y || n } ( ( Lam ` m ) x. ( Lam ` ( n / m ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A a i m n y $.
$d S m n y $.
